remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此字段为`static`、`obj`参数将被忽略。If the field is `static`, the `obj` parameter is ignored. 对于非静态字段，`obj`应是继承或声明该字段的类的实例。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 返回类型是。The return type of is . 例如，如果该字段将持有一个布尔值基元值，实例带有相应 Boolean 返回值。For example, if the field holds a Boolean primitive value, an instance of with the appropriate Boolean value is returned. 在返回值之前,检查以确定用户是否有访问权限。Before returning the value, checks to see if the user has access permission. 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. `Private` 构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问并调用完全信任代码时使用反射。`Private` constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully-trusted.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetConstant (object defaultValue);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetConstant(object defaultValue) cil managed
Public Sub SetConstant (defaultValue As Object)
public: void SetConstant(System::Object ^ defaultValue);

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 该字段的新默认值。

span.span: The new default value for this field.

summary.span: 设置该字段的默认值。

span.span: Sets the default value of this field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `defaultValue` 限制为以下类型： `Boolean`， `SByte`， `Int16`， `Int32`， `Int64`， `Byte`， `UInt16`， `UInt32`， `UInt64`， `Single`， `Double`， `DateTime``Char`， `String`，和`Enum`。`defaultValue` is restricted to the following types: `Boolean`, `SByte`, `Int16`, `Int32`, `Int64`, `Byte`, `UInt16`, `UInt32`, `UInt64`, `Single`, `Double`, `DateTime`, `Char`, `String`, and `Enum`. CLS 遵从性的引用类型的字段类型时，需要`defaultValue`要`null`。If the field type is a reference type, CLS compliance requires `defaultValue` to be `null`. 但是，从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，`defaultValue`可以为非 null 的类型，只要该值可以分配给该引用类型的引用。However, starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], `defaultValue` can be non-null for a reference type as long as the value can be assigned to that reference type. 例如，`Int32`值可以分配给类型的字段。For example, an `Int32` value can be assigned to a field of type . 这不符合 CLS，但它可以是互操作方案中十分有用。This is not CLS-compliant, but it can be useful in interop scenarios.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会将分配`val`给字段的参数反映此实例在 `obj`。This method will assign the `val` parameter to the field reflected by this instance on `obj`. 如果此字段为静态，`obj`将被忽略。If the field is static, `obj` will be ignored. 对于非静态字段，`obj`应是继承或声明该字段的类的实例。For non-static fields, `obj` should be an instance of a class that inherits or declares the field. 新值将传递作为。The new value is passed as an . 例如，如果字段的类型为布尔值，实例带有相应 Boolean 值被传递。For example, if the field's type is Boolean, an instance of with the appropriate Boolean value is passed. 在设置值前,检查以确定用户是否有访问权限。Before setting the value, checks to see if the user has access permission. 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。Access restrictions are ignored for fully-trusted code. `Private` 构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问并调用完全信任代码时使用反射。`Private` constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully-trusted. > [!NOTE] > 当前不支持该方法。This method is currently not supported. 一种解决方法，检索通过反射的已完成的类型和调用设置字段的值。As a workaround, retrieve the by reflecting on the finished type and call to set the value of the field.

exception.span: 不支持此方法。

span.span: This method is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: void _FieldBuilder.GetIDsOfNames (ref Guid riid, IntPtr rgszNames, uint cNames, uint lcid, IntPtr rgDispId);

span.span: Must be IID_NULL.

span.span: Passed-in array of names to be mapped.

span.span: Maps a set of names to a corresponding set of dispatch identifiers.
